description: Gourmet food truck & catering• D Magazine Best Food Truck 2013 • The Daily Meal 101 Best Food Trucks in America 2013• Thrillist 21 Best Food Trucks in the US 2014 • Zagat Top 10 Burgers in Dallas 2014 • Dallas Observer Best Food Truck 2014Easy Slider offers a variety of sliders, many featuring regionally-raised meats and locally-sourced produce. The menu consists primarily of beef, but we also offer pork, chicken, seafood and vegetarian options. In addition, Easy Slider carries our favorite Zapp's chips and truck-made slaws.
name: Easy Slider Truck
